programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
A.I. Sztuczna inteligencja
Artificial Intelligence: AI
programme.desc:
A.I. Artificial Intelligence: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Haley Joel Osment, Frances O'Connor, Sam Robards, Jake Thomas. A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0212720/","name":"A.I. Artificial Intelligence","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWU2NzEyMDYtM2MyOS00OGM3LWFkNzAtMzRiNzE2ZjU5ZTljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0212720/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"epsilon3"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great movie trying to get out","reviewBody":"A.I. is a difficult film. Some of it is brilliant, while some is dire.

The acting - Haley Joel Osment as David the mecha (robot) boy is superb. He plays the role with such intelligence and maturity - it's a real achievement and bodes well for his future (if he can avoid hitting the self destruct button like so many other child stars.) Jude Law puts in another solid performance as 'Gigolo Joe' the mecha prostitute. In a similar vein to his previous roles in Gattaca and eXistenZ, he's quirky and somehow detached from reality - it works brilliantly. He's rapidly turning into one of my favourite actors. "Hey Joe - Waddya know?"

The rest of the cast is very good but doesn't shine, perhaps because their characters were treated lightly and not fully explored. Overall though - good performances by all.

The sets , costumes and special effects are of a very high standard. Until the last 30 minutes or so, the use of computer graphics is tastefully done and never feel like an excuse to wow the audience with some clever CGI. The scenes at the Flesh Fair (a kind of rock concert where mecha are destroyed for the entertainment of spectators) are powerful, visceral and in your face. The flying and underwater scenes were also very well handled, although not mind blowing. 

Now the downside, and it's a big downside. 

The plot is incredibly disjointed. I didn't expect it to be so obvious that this movie had been directed by two different people and thought Spielberg to be more subtle. There was apparently little attempt by Spielberg to blend his parts of the movie with Kubrick's to create a coherent whole. Instead what we get is a wonderfully dark first 60-90 minutes and then something reminiscent of 'Close Encounters of the E.T. kind' tacked on to make us feel good. As a result, the feel of the film quickly evaporated into a mush. There were a couple of chances to end the movie earlier (notably at the end of the underwater section) and it was a mistake to take the movie beyond these points. The poignancy is lost with repeated attempts to extend and explain the story in unnecessary ways, the scene with David's mother towards the end being especially contrived and saccharin. 

The sum up, this felt like two movies in one - an intelligent, dark and fascinating film mixed one that's formulaic, sentimental and cheesy. Because of this it fails to reach the promised heights and at times feels messy. It's ultimately unsatisfying and left me very disappointed, but not because it's bad, but rather because I expected so much more. As many others have said, I can't help wondering what heights it would have reached if Kubrick hadn't passed away.

An interesting film, but rent it first as it's not for everyone.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":299750,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2001-10-17","keywords":"artificial intelligence,mother son relationship,synthetic human,artificially created boy,cyberpunk","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A.I. Artificial Intelligence","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi212009753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDk5Y2ZiZTYtMWVhMS00MzEyLTg5ZWItZjliZTRiNGM0MWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDk5Y2ZiZTYtMWVhMS00MzEyLTg5ZWItZjliZTRiNGM0MWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Warner Bros. Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005286/","name":"Haley Joel Osment"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0640323/","name":"Frances O'Connor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000735/","name":"Brian Aldiss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914668/","name":"Ian Watson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"duration":"PT2H26M"}</script><metacontent="

Red Lights
programme.desc: Red Lights: Directed by Rodrigo Cortés. With Cillian Murphy, Sigourney Weaver, Robert De Niro, Toby Jones. Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1748179/","name":"Red Lights","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMjYwNTc2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY0Mjc4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1748179/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"karmaswimswami"},"dateCreated":"2014-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Energetic, accessible, engrossing","reviewBody":"Rodrigo Cortes has all the makings of an auteur. "Red Lights" really puts the hook in viewers, and is hard to stop watching once it gets going. You get the feeling Cortes is quite enthusiastic, just dying to tell you this yarn. His script is well-written, intelligent, and never bamboozles. Elisabeth Olsen is incandescent, and the performances from all the leads have them in top form. Some may criticize the film as being overproduced: many sequences are bursting forth with camera angles and takes, and these combined with Cortes's fulminating style of editing sometimes give the film the feel of "Desperate Hours." But I loved this film, loved the color palette, loved the patois and exposition, and admire Cortes's confident bombast. Great things are coming from this filmmaker.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60338,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-03-02","keywords":"psychic,revelation,obsession,younger version of character,road trip","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3842417177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ4NzcyNTYwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc5ODg4MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ4NzcyNTYwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc5ODg4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away. programme.title: Le couperet
Życie za śmierć
The Dark
programme.desc:
Le couperet: Directed by Costa-Gavras. With José Garcia, Karin Viard, Geordy Couturiau, Christa Théret. A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0422015/","name":"Le couperet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDAzNjYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTIzMDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0422015/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Sarcastic View of the Effects of Downsizing","reviewBody":"The thirty-nine years old executive Bruno Davert (José Garcia) has been working for fifteen years in a paper company. After a merging operation with a Romania's company, he is fired in a downsizing. While unemployed for two years, Bruno loses his self-esteem and sanity and his family loses the middle-class lifestyle without cable television, Internet and regular consumption. He concludes that there is too much competition in his sector for a few job positions and decides to literally eliminate his competitors, killing those more qualified than him.

"Le Couperet" is a sarcastic view of the greed of the companies and the effects of downsizing in the self-esteem and sanity of a man. The awareness of the economical situation in France (but could be in most of the nations) and black-humor of Costas-Gravas gives a fantastic satire to the greed of the corporations, aiming exclusively profits without any care for the human beings. The sub-employment, as means of survival; the exacerbated use of merchandising to force the consumption; the situation of the family, being emotionally shattered with the stressful situation of the husband and father; all of these elements are ironically presented in this tough and realistic social satire through a French middle-class family. José Garcia is stunning in the role of a bitter man fighting to find job position and serial killer. My vote is eight.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0422015, Title: Le couperet, --- Description: Le couperet: Directed by Costa-Gavras. With José Garcia, Karin Viard, Geordy Couturiau, Christa Théret. A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0422015/","name":"Le couperet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDAzNjYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTIzMDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0422015/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho","dateCreated":"2007-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Sarcastic View of the Effects of Downsizing","reviewBody":"The thirty-nine years old executive Bruno Davert (José Garcia) has been working for fifteen years in a paper company. After a merging operation with a Romania's company, he is fired in a downsizing. While unemployed for two years, Bruno loses his self-esteem and sanity and his family loses the middle-class lifestyle without cable television, Internet and regular consumption. He concludes that there is too much competition in his sector for a few job positions and decides to literally eliminate his competitors, killing those more qualified than him.

"Le Couperet" is a sarcastic view of the greed of the companies and the effects of downsizing in the self-esteem and sanity of a man. The awareness of the economical situation in France (but could be in most of the nations) and black-humor of Costas-Gravas gives a fantastic satire to the greed of the corporations, aiming exclusively profits without any care for the human beings. The sub-employment, as means of survival; the exacerbated use of merchandising to force the consumption; the situation of the family, being emotionally shattered with the stressful situation of the husband and father; all of these elements are ironically presented in this tough and realistic social satire through a French middle-class family. José Garcia is stunning in the role of a bitter man fighting to find job position and serial killer. My vote is eight.

programme.title: The Grudge
The Grudge - Klątwa
The Grudge
programme.desc:
The Grudge: Directed by Takashi Shimizu. With Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, William Mapother, Clea DuVall. An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0391198/","name":"The Grudge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxODg1Nzc3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0391198/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"olivewahh"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's still good after so many years","reviewBody":"With the new release of The Grudge, I went back and rewatched this original to see if it was as good as I had remembered.

Karen (Sarah Michelle Gellar) lives in Japan and works as a caretaker for the elderly people. Getting assigned a job, Karen visits the elder lady and begins to discover some unusual and mysterious behaviour coming from the house. After leaving the house, things become haunting for Karen with everywhere she goes and discovers a dark history of the house.

Honestly, for a film that came out in 2004, it's pretty good. I mean watching it now, the graphics aren't amazing, but again the film is 16 years old. I remember when the film came out that a lot of people said the original Japanese version was terrifying, but I still think this one is scary.

SMG was such an A Lister when this came out, after staring in Buffy and many other iconic movies, everyone knew who she was. She's not bad in the film, except when she runs like she's still in Buffy lol

Still would recommend this film to fans of horror. It's a great watch","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":142390,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"elderly,housewife,pet cat,bus,male frontal nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Grudge","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi761242649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Grudge"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001264/","name":"Sarah Michelle Gellar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004736/","name":"Jason Behr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0245112/","name":"Clea DuVall"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167921/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839812/","name":"Stephen Susco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ju-on 2
Klątwa Ju-on 2
Ju-on 2
programme.desc:
Ju-on 2: Directed by Takashi Shimizu. With Noriko Sakai, Chiharu Niiyama, Kei Horie, Yui Ichikawa. As their curse spreads on, the ghosts find their chance to live once again through the pregnancy of a cursed woman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0367913/","name":"Ju-on 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGY5ZTk1MDQtMzVkMS00YWI5LWEzN2UtYTlmNTNhMGViMjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"As their curse spreads on, the ghosts find their chance to live once again through the pregnancy of a cursed woman.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0367913/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gafke"},"dateCreated":"2004-05-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Freaky!","reviewBody":"The rage of Kayako and her son Toshio continue in this sequel to "Ju-On: The Grudge." Creepier and scarier than the first film, Ju-On 2 begins with a young couple and a tragic car accident which leaves a pregnant television star named Kyoko devastated. With her fiancé in a coma and her unborn baby supposedly lost, she continues with her blossoming career in horror films. But when she agrees to appear in a pseudo-documentary about the "haunted house" where Kayako and Toshio still "reside," the virus of the Grudge begins anew. Soon, everyone involved with the production is missing or dead, and Kyoko, who has recently been informed that her baby is not lost after all, begins to realize that what she is carrying may not be hers at all.

Ju-On 2 is definitely much more scarier than its predecessor. Disturbing sound effects, jerky camera movements and one dizzy nightmarish scene after another literally left me reeling, feeling as confused and freaked out as the characters in the film. There are some great visual effects here; Kayako and her wild hair spread over a ceiling, tendrils dropping down into lethal nooses; a wig come to hideous life and the ghostly blue Toshio staring out of the darkness. The ending was a work of morbid art, leaving me quite stunned. "Ju-On 2" has proved beyond a doubt that sequels are not always a bad thing, and sometimes, they're even better!

Highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9609,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2003-09-05","keywords":"pregnancy,haunted house,ghost,supernatural pregnancy,asian horror","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0757015/","name":"Noriko Sakai"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639122/","name":"Chiharu Niiyama"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394676/","name":"Kei Horie"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022792/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Paranormal Witness
Paranormal Witness
Doświadczyć niezwykłego
Paranormal Witness
programme.desc: Paranormal Witness: With Gillian English, Frances Townend, Daniel Cannis, Colin Murphy. A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1874066/","name":"Paranormal Witness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZkZTQxZTEtN2VjYi00ZDg3LTlkZDAtMWIzMGNjODcwMzE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY0NzcxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1874066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dsaillant811"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrifying","reviewBody":"This is one of the freakiest shows on TV, but before watching it, you need to know what you're getting into. This show DOES NOT try to prove or disprove the paranormal. Nor are the stories even slightly realistic. When you realize that, you will appreciate the show much more. I really don't like the 2-story episodes of season 1. Season 2 is a lot better. Season 2 is all-around stronger, better, and scarier. There are plenty of jump scenes and loads of suspense. This is probably the best "Haunted Documentary" style show on TV. programme.title: Snowmageddon
Śnieżny Armagedon
Snowmageddon
programme.desc:
Snowmageddon: Directed by Sheldon Wilson. With David Cubitt, Laura Harris, Dylan Matzke, Magda Apanowicz. An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1876446/","name":"Snowmageddon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJkNGFiYTctNmRmMi00Mzc3LWJiZWYtN2RhNDkyZWFjYTBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the g","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1876446/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another case of the not terrible but not good either sort of movie","reviewBody":"As I have said many times already I have made no secret of disliking a lot of SyFy's films, but I do keep watching to see if they do come up with something that is watchable at least. They have done a few movies that are surprisingly tolerable though even they are far from perfect, but most are bad but you are amused by the awfulness or are like witnessing a train-wreck.

I was very mixed on Snowmageddon actually, of the above categories it sits between the tolerable and so bad it's good ones. I do give it plaudits for the better than average acting, granted it is not brilliant but it is award-worthy compared to the likes of Quantum Apocalypse and Titanic II, decent photography and a storyline that is mostly interesting and original in concept.

That is not to say that the story is perfect though. It is interesting and generally well paced, but it does take a while to get going and the ending is abrupt. There are also scenes and ideas that suspend disbelief and don't make much sense, but for the first time in a while I actually got some novelty value out of them. These are including the ideas that electricity is still flowing in a town that is cut off from the rest of the world, flying even with ice bombs are going off and nobody in the town carrying a knife.

Snowmageddon also has some amateurish effects-though I've seen worse-, cheesy dialogue and characters that aren't developed enough to make us care for them. I loved the title, but it didn't fit with the concept and story, it was like there had been a last minute title change or that they had thought of a new idea and forgot to think of a title that fitted.

Overall, not as bad as other SyFy efforts, but there is nothing really that stood out to make it memorable or good. 4/10 Bethany Cox","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1159,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-12-10","keywords":"disaster film,globe,christmas,snow,the family","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190931/","name":"David Cubitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364977/","name":"Laura Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3676866/","name":"Dylan Matzke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934135/","name":"Sheldon Wilson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337940/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0998149/","name":"Rudy Thauberger"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1876446, Title: Snowmageddon, --- Description: Snowmageddon: Directed by Sheldon Wilson. With David Cubitt, Laura Harris, Dylan Matzke, Magda Apanowicz. An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1876446/","name":"Snowmageddon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJkNGFiYTctNmRmMi00Mzc3LWJiZWYtN2RhNDkyZWFjYTBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Alaskan town is in danger of destruction by a mystical snow globe that appears on a family's doorstep, wrapped like a Christmas gift, and causes deadly "natural" disasters in the real world, while simultaneously occurring in the g","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1876446/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird","dateCreated":"2012-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another case of the not terrible but not good either sort of movie","reviewBody":"As I have said many times already I have made no secret of disliking a lot of SyFy's films, but I do keep watching to see if they do come up with something that is watchable at least. They have done a few movies that are surprisingly tolerable though even they are far from perfect, but most are bad but you are amused by the awfulness or are like witnessing a train-wreck.

I was very mixed on Snowmageddon actually, of the above categories it sits between the tolerable and so bad it's good ones. I do give it plaudits for the better than average acting, granted it is not brilliant but it is award-worthy compared to the likes of Quantum Apocalypse and Titanic II, decent photography and a storyline that is mostly interesting and original in concept.

That is not to say that the story is perfect though. It is interesting and generally well paced, but it does take a while to get going and the ending is abrupt. There are also scenes and ideas that suspend disbelief and don't make much sense, but for the first time in a while I actually got some novelty value out of them. These are including the ideas that electricity is still flowing in a town that is cut off from the rest of the world, flying even with ice bombs are going off and nobody in the town carrying a knife.

Snowmageddon also has some amateurish effects-though I've seen worse-, cheesy dialogue and characters that aren't developed enough to make us care for them. I loved the title, but it didn't fit with the concept and story, it was like there had been a last minute title change or that they had thought of a new idea and forgot to think of a title that fitted.

Overall, not as bad as other SyFy efforts, but there is nothing really that stood out to make it memorable or good. 4/10 Bethany Cox","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1159,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-12-10","keywords":"disaster film,globe,christmas,snow,the family","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190931/","name":"David Cubitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364977/","name":"Laura Harris","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3676866/","name":"Dylan Matzke"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934135/","name":"Sheldon Wilson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337940/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0998149/","name":"Rudy Thauberger"],"duration":"PT1H29M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Sheldon Wilson

Grudge 3: Powrót klątwy
The Grudge 3
programme.desc: The Grudge 3: Directed by Toby Wilkins. With Matthew Knight, Shawnee Smith, Mike Straub, Aiko Horiuchi. A young Japanese woman who holds the key to stopping the evil spirit of Kayako, travels to the haunted Chicago apartment from the sequel, to stop the curse of Kayako once and for all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1053859/","name":"The Grudge 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MThiYjItMDliMC00YWM4LTljZTEtNTg0YzdiMmE2MjM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Japanese woman who holds the key to stopping the evil spirit of Kayako, travels to the haunted Chicago apartment from the sequel, to stop the curse of Kayako once and for all.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1053859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"philip_roque"},"dateCreated":"2010-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrible.","reviewBody":"First of all, I have been a huge fan of Japanese horror movies ever since I saw the original Japanese version of The Ring nearly 8-9 years ago. I have seen a lot of different horror movies but I have to say, my favourites are The Ring and the Ju-On franchise.\n\nAfter seeing that there was a The Grudge 3, I had some hopes for it. But boy, if only I knew what was coming...Where to start? The acting was utterly horrible and the plot was forgettable. As for the scary parts, we all know whats coming, you see the boy in white, you hear that classic sound of ju-on and you see her approaching her victim, over and over and over again. There is nothing new to this movie and its about time to let the franchise take a rest.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18211,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-06-02","keywords":"curse,sequel,father murders son,demonic possession,bare chested male","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Grudge 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1138098969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2IxZTM0YWItY2EzYy00MjBjLTgwMTYtZjEyZjc2MmYzNWU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2IxZTM0YWItY2EzYy00MjBjLTgwMTYtZjEyZjc2MmYzNWU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1342743/","name":"Matthew Knight"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809938/","name":"Shawnee Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2467178/","name":"Mike Straub"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929317/","name":"Toby Wilkins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0386431/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1778066/","name":"Brad Keene"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Die Flüchtlinge der zerstörten 'Thera Sita' werden auf einem Hangardeck der Galactica untergebracht. Unter ihnen bricht die gefährliche Krankheit Mellorak aus. Doch die meisten sind Sagittarier, die jede medizinische Behandlung aus religiösen Gründen ablehnen. Prompt stirbt einer von ihnen nach der Behandlung durch Dr. Roberts. Aber war sein Tod unvermeidlich oder ein Mord aus rassistischen Gründen.
